RXWidth.description: The totoal number of lanes for the receving packets.
RXWidth.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of lanes for the receiving packets.

TXWidth.description: The totoal number of lanes for the transmitting packets.
TXWidth.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of lanes for the transmitting packets.
